data.title: WNY’s Local Credit Union
data.meta_description: Cornerstone Community FCU is WNY’s Local Credit Union. Visit our website to learn why our members choose to bank, borrow, and invest with us today.
data.text:
Join Us At Community Day!

Mark your calendars for our 2nd Annual Cornerstone Community Day! We’ll have games, delicious food, fantastic local vendors, a basket raffle, and so much more. It’s the ultimate family outing you won’t want to miss!

We’re aiming to raise $30,000 for The Kenan Center, Niagara Hospice, and Buddy’s Second Chance Rescue!

Keeping You Safe

Since 1957, we’ve always put our members first and the security of your personal and financial information is our top priority.

Financial fraud is on the rise and we have been working diligently to protect our members.

Stay up to date with the latest in cybersecurity and learn more about protecting yourself by visiting our Security Center!

Community Cornerstone Recipient

Meet Marg Domagalski, our most recent Community Cornerstone Award winner!

Marg is the president of Niagara Heritage of Hope and Service, Inc., a 100% volunteer-based group in Niagara Falls. Through her work, Marg has shown incredible dedication and passion, transforming and preserving the former Holy Trinity Church in to a vibrant community space. Built in the early 1900s, the church is a vital part of the area’s Polish heritage, but Marg’s commitment extends beyond cultural preservation. She has been instrumental in aiding the underprivileged, opening a Community Thrift Store in 2011 and converting the rectory and convent into a business center and retreat center. Her continuous efforts to improve and preserve the historic complex, along with her unwavering commitment to her community, truly make her a Community Cornerstone. Click here to learn more about Marg and her incredible work!

In partnership with Country 106.5 WYRK and 93.7 WBLK, we are seeking nominations to reward an individual’s passion for our community. Our monthly winner will receive a $500 donation to the winner’s favorite cause, and a $100 dinner gift certificate to celebrate! Think of a worthy recipient and nominate them for the Community Cornerstone!

Become an owner today!

As a member of Cornerstone, you are given the attention and care as an owner, not a customer. Since we are a nonprofit and centered around serving, your financial success is our goal. Our members have access to some of the lowest loan rates and fees in our area and a digital experience that will bring more financial freedom to your life. Before opening an account at a bank, check with Cornerstone.

Becoming a member is easy. If you live, work, worship, or volunteer in Niagara or Erie County, you are eligible for a Cornerstone membership.

Join Cornerstone and experience the credit union difference today.
